title: Pesticides and transformation products in surface waters of western Montérégie, Canada: Occurrence, spatial distribution and ecotoxicological risks
content:

The objective of this study was to investigate the occurrence, spatial distribution, and ecotoxicological risk of pesticides and transformation products for the surface waters of western Montérégie (Quebec, Canada). A...
